body.name: 1875W Steamer for Clothes with 360ML Tank, Fast Heat-Up and Auto-Off, LCD Steamer Iron 2 in 1 Fabric Wrinkle Removes with Hanger and Brush, Handheld Clothes Steamer and Portable Garment Steamer
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 21 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 22 hrs 6 mins
features: [EASY TO USE]: GANIBAY clothes steamer preheats in just 25s for quick wrinkle removal. The lock switch allows for continuous steaming and an LCD screen making it simple for you to operate.
[EFFECTIVE WRINKLE REMOVAL IN SECONDS]: High powerful steam output at 26 Grams/Min that thoroughly penetrates the fabric and smooths out the toughest creases.

[NO-SPILLING AT ANY ANGLE]: This clothes steamer with a unique 360°leak-proof design, this 2 in 1 steamer for clothes allows you to steam your clothes while hanging vertically or lying horizontally, without the worry of drips or stains. Say goodbye to the frustration of ironing with GANIBAY handheld clothes steamer and experience effortless steaming.

[STEAM ANY FABRIC]: Our steamer iron for clothes has 2 steam modes to choose from. The first level is gentle for delicate fabrics such as silk, chiffon and wool, while the second level is strong for heavy garments such as cotton, linen and nylon. The ceramic plate of handheld steamer will reach a high temperature of 230°F and you can use the portable steamer for dry ironing directly once the water is depleted.

[LARGE CAPACITY WATER TANK]: The 12.7oz detachable water tank provides up to 25 minutes of continuous steam, which can iron 15 pieces of clothing at a time. Handheld steamer for clothes is perfect for business trips, holidays, destination weddings or anywhere you need to quickly, safely and gently smooth and de-wrinkle delicate garments!

[EXQUISITE CLOTHES STEAMER SETS]: The high-quality garment steamer will satisfy your family and friends and will be a perfect gift for your family and friends. Each set not only comes with an attachable fabric brush to easily remove lint but also a retractable hanger to save space in your suitcase or travel bag. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The first steamer I ever purchased was from Walmart 7 years ago which died recently, so I went shopping at Amazon to replace it. This one far exceeds what I had previously. It is a little larger and puts out significantly more steam. It's definitely more substantial than my old one and therefore a little heavier, but it is not too heavy and very easy to use. I'm happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super useful! Throw away your ironing board and iron!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is incredible, it holds plenty of water and really takes the wrinkles off the clothes quickly! I love that it comes with a foldable hanger that I can take with me wherever I go when on-the-go! It’s of good quality and it has a little but that makes it really easy to use and either slide it up to have it always on, or just hold it down to use as needed. It’s definitely worth the money! Best purchase I’ve made in a while. Bye bye ironing board!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hands-down one of the best purchases I've made this year. I got it on sale because this is my first handheld steamer and I wasn't sure I'd like it, but this is worth full price. It heats up super quickly, works extremely well, and goes pretty far on a single tank of water. I needed to refill it between sets of curtains, but the first set is basically floor to ceiling. The left side of the beige curtains is steamed, the right side isn't. I'm honestly shocked I got these results without having to lay the curtains down on a solid surface.It got a little heavy after steaming four curtains, but not overly so. This would certainly be too heavy for someone with muscular degeneration, but should be fine for someone with average upper arm strength.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Amazing Steaming Performance
reviews.reviewText: The steamer was ready for use rather quickly. The wrinkles were steamed away from the curtain panels with minimal effort. I steamed both panels without a need to refill the water chamber. I highly recommend this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this steamer! I’ve used it on multiple materials and it works great on all of them. I love the dry iron and ability to steam on flat surface as well as hanging. It heats up fast, and lasts a long time 15/20 minutes straight before needing to refill the water. I’ve tried a couple other steamers and this one has been my favorite by far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is very easy to use and is a great value. Knock wrinkles out without quick leaving clothes professionally ironed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wasn’t sure when I purchased this product. After using it a few times I am really enjoying it.It works great. Takes the wrinkles right out. I have used it on shirts as well as my suit. It’s a little heavy, but well worth the money.I really recommend this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Produced Hot Steam but did not work
reviews.reviewText: The Steamer’s product quality was good and it is user friendly. It produced hot steam and did not leak as I was using it , plus the LED display was nice however it did not work to get the wrinkles out for a scarf made of 100% cotton. I tried it three times but my scarf was still wrinkly.
